article_title: Ted Cruz's Obamacare Nightmare Comes to Life
article_text: In the summer of 2013, with the Affordable Care Act about to begin enrolling its first customers in the new health-care exchanges, Ted Cruz warned Republicans that they were facing one final chance to kill the law.
